channel.title: Executes on Arc
channel.description: Recent content in Executes on Arc

item.title: Execute
item.description: *Execute stages are used to execute arbitrary commands against external systems such as Databases and APIs. HTTPExecute The HTTPExecute takes an input Map[String, String] from the configuration and executes a POST request against a remote HTTP service. This could be used to initialise another process that depends on the output of data pipeline. Parameters Attribute Type Required Description name String true Name of the stage for logging.
